activities: Inventus provides e-discovery consulting and related services to corporations, corporate legal departments and law firm. At the direction of our clients, Inventus collects, processes and hosts electronic data in our secure data environments. This data may contain personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, On-line and manually processed data.
recoursemech: We will use the American Arbitration Association (AAA), ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program
